IsEmail: {property} must be a valid email address
Min: {property} with value: "{value}" must be at least {constraints.0}
Max: {property} with value: "{value}" must be less than {constraints.0}
IsEnum: {property} must be a valid value in ({constraints.0})
IsBlockArray: {property} must be an array of blocks
IsCreditCard: {property} must be a valid credit card number
MaxLength: {property} must be shorter or equal to {constraints.0} characters
ArrayMaxSize: {property} must have less or equal to {constraints.0} elements
IsPhoneNumber: {property} must be a valid phone number
ValidatePromise: {property} must be validated as a promise
IsLatLong: {property} must be a valid latitude and longitude
IsNotIn: {property} must not be an invalid value
IsAlphanumeric: {property} must contain only letters and numbers
IsByteLength: {property} must have a valid byte length
IsFQDN: {property} must be a fully qualified domain name
IsMacAddress: {property} must be a valid MAC address
IsIP: {property} must be a valid IP address
IsISO8601: {property} must be a valid ISO 8601 date
IsMobilePhone: {property} must be a valid mobile phone number
IsISO31661Alpha2: {property} must be a valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code
IsISO31661Alpha3: {property} must be a valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code
IsMongoId: {property} must be a valid MongoDB ID
IsFirebasePushId: {property} must be a valid Firebase push ID
Length: {property} must have a length between {constraints.0} and {constraints.1}
MinLength: {property} must be longer or equal to {constraints.0} characters
IsMilitaryTime: {property} must be a valid military time
IsBtcAddress: {property} must be a valid Bitcoin address
IsDataURI: {property} must be a valid data URI
IsEthereumAddress: {property} must be a valid Ethereum address
IsHSL: {property} must be a valid HSL color
IsIdentityCard: {property} must be a valid identity card
IsMagnetURI: {property} must be a valid Magnet URI
IsMimeType: {property} must be a valid MIME type
IsOctal: {property} must be a valid octal number
IsPassportNumber: {property} must be a valid passport number
IsPostalCode: {property} must be a valid postal code
IsRFC3339: {property} must be a valid RFC 3339 date
IsRgbColor: {property} must be a valid RGB color
IsSemVer: {property} must be a valid SemVer version
IsTimeZone: {property} must be a valid time zone
is-tax-id: {property} must be a valid tax ID
is-iso4217-currency-code: {property} must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code
IsNotEmptyObject: {property} must not be an empty object
BankCodeValidator: {property} should start with TT or FT and followed by numbers
